title: "You might have computer vision syndrome if you have constant headaches, blurred vision"
excerpt: "Digital eye strain, also known as computer vision syndrome, encompasses a range of eye and vision-related issues resulting from prolonged digital device use such as headaches, eyestrain, blurred vision and dry eyes."
